text: mage paramadhipati yuktiya ana kara ætæyi (nabivaraya !) numba pavasanu. sirasa namana sæma sthanayakama numbalage muhunu sthapita karanu. tavada numbala ohuta pamanak dahama puda kota avamkayin lesin ohugen ayæda sitinu. numbala va ohu arambha kalak men numbala nævata (ohu vetama) hæri yanu æta
